subject: Records and Achievements
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Bob Hurley, coach at St. Anthony High School of Jersey City, earned the 1,000th win of his career Wednesday with a 76-46 victory over neighboring rival St. Mary.
snippet: Bob Hurley, coach at St. Anthony High School of Jersey City, earned the 1,000th win of his career Wednesday with a 76-46 victory over neighboring rival St. Mary.
